We take great care to ensure all advertised prices & details are correct. However, occasionally we are given incorrect information or make errors (yes, even us). We therefore do not guarantee your search results will always be 100% accurate. Please note advertised specials are available only while stocks last. We recommend you reconfirm all advertised specials with the retailer before purchasing. LIPS will not be held responsible for unavailable specials, out-of-stock items or pricing errors.
